Job Description:

Searching for a Lead Business Data Analyst within Compliance Trade Surveillance Technology to actively participates in all of the software development cycle and coordinate work across various applications, operations or LOBs as necessary to maintain or deliver the business solution.

Job Requirements:
  • 5-7 years experience in business analysis with expertise in different technologies, business areas, application wide analysis, and proposal of solutions.
  • Responsibilities include requirement gathering, writing Business Requirement Documents (BRD), Scoping & Assessment and High Level Designs (HLD), Perform feasibility analysis, scope projects, prioritize deliverables, recommend alternative solutions and project strategies, and engage in negotiations.
  • Participate in daily scrum calls in agile environment along with sprint planning every 2 weeks.
  • Senior Business Analysts should also be able to perform as team leaders when necessary
  • Technologies include Microsoft Office, Microsoft Visio, Toad, XML, SQL, Autosys, JIRA
    • Top Skills:
  • Good Financial Product Knowledge (Decent knowledge with trading. They specialize in FX and Equities. Financial a must)
  • Excellent Communication
  • Strong Scripting skills (UNIX/Windows)
  • Good SQL Skills
  • Strong Presentation Skills (Flow Diagrams, Mock-ups, Spreadsheet Processing)
  • Project Coordination
